articles.author: Rebecca Russo
articles.title: Parking across Melbourne's CBD will be free until January 3 - Time Out Melbourne
articles.description: Melbourne city council is hoping to entice people back into the city with free parking, but pay attention to street signs.
articles.content:
This festive season might be a little bit easier on the old hip pocket with Melbourne city council announcing free street parking across its municipality.

articles.title: JobKeeper recipients drop by half in a single month as Treasurer hails economic recovery from coronavirus - ABC News
